txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Blackened fur for a personal project. Please deliver the fur to Lieva Dourlilly at The Forsaken Inn. No coin involved, but the effort would be appreciated.

'These will do nicely. I wish that I had something to offer you, but Anlaf is offering most of the coin for important things for the inn, and I have little myself. I hope that the experience of adventure more than covers what you have done.\n\n'I thank you, heartily, friend.'

'Oh, you took the note that I had posted for the blackened fur. I am afraid I am not comfortable explaining what it is for...it is nothing nefarious, just of a personal nature. I am making something for someone and need the fur. Are you still willing to help?'

An unlikely collection has been requested by one of the workers at The Forsaken Inn. The request is for a large collection of blackened fur. This fur can be found on many of the beasts within the western sections of the Lone-lands.
Deliver the fur to Lieva Dourlilly at The Forsaken Inn
You accepted a task to acquire tufts of blackened fur for Lieva Dourlilly, a worker at The Forsaken Inn in the Lone-lands. You can find the fur on the beasts in the area of the western Lone-lands.
Needed: Blackened fur for a personal project.
